abstract: While the stock market greeted the Fed’s move as a sign it will do what is necessary to prevent a recession, the news was not embraced by the bond, commodities and currency markets.
snippet: While the stock market greeted the Fed’s move as a sign it will do what is necessary to prevent a recession, the news was not embraced by the bond, commodities and currency markets.
lead_paragraph: For stock investors, the Federal Reserve delivered just the right tonic yesterday.

headline.main: Investors Divided on the Fed’s Rate Cut
headline.print_headline: Investors Divided on the Fed’s Rate Cut
